body.name: PRUVEEO Dash Cam, Front and Inside 1080P Dual FHD, Novatek Processor, Single-Channel 2160P, Built-in WiFi, 24H Parking Monitor, 2 Inch LCD Camera, 512 Gb Max, G-Sensor, Infrared Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 22 mins
features: [Dual FHD 1080P Dash Cam] Each of the front and cabin cameras records in 1080P at 30fps or in single-channel 2160P at 24fps (multiple resolution options). Each camera has a 150° wide angle and a maximum viewing angle of 300° with nearly no blind spots. The 2.0-inch LCD's size enables for a wider, clearer vision. For family road trips or use with Uber, Lyft, taxis, or cabs

[Quality Night Vision and WDR Technology] The cabin cameras have an F1.8 aperture and 4 infrared lights. In addition to producing incredibly clear recordings, its image performance will be far superior to that of other dash cams at night. The two cameras also have the latest, most sensitive night vision image sensor integrated right into them, so they can capture stunning images even in pitch-black spaces at night.

[24H Parking Monitor] To leave it running while parked, you must get an ACC hardwire kit with low battery voltage sensing (not included). Dash cameras can be a well-hidden witness to the road in front of them thanks to their distinctive low-profile design. The two cameras may be turned 50 degrees left and right and 180 degrees forward and backward.

[Loop Recording and Emergency Accident Locks] To assure indefinite loop recording, the oldest unlocked footage will be automatically erased when the memory card reaches its maximum storage capacity. Supports class 10 or above micro-SD cards up to 512GB and loop recording for 1, 2, or 3 minutes. Once the built-in G-sensor senses a collision, the D30 dash cam will automatically lock the currently recording footage as evidence of an event. Loop Recording will not overwrite the locked files.

[Easy Installation with No Battery] With the help of the reference images in our user manual, this D30 dash camera is very simple to install and use. The accompanying suction mount is simple to install in a matter of seconds on your windshield. Add an SD card (not provided) and link to the power source. There is no battery included to prevent against mishaps from sun exposure, hot temperatures inside the automobile, or battery damage.
body.description: Why choose Pruveeo D30 Dash Cam? Front and Inside Dual FHD 1080P Dash Cam [DUAL FHD 1080P DASH CAM] - Front and Inside cameras each record dual 1080P @ 30fps / single-channel 2160P @ 24fps (multiple resolution options). When the memory card reaches its maximum capacity, the oldest unlocked footage will be overwritten automatically to ensure infinite loop recording. The D30 dash cam will automatically lock the current recording video as proof of an incident once the built-in G-sensor detects a collision. Single-channel Up to 2160P @ 24fps Superior Night Vision & WDR Technology Inside Cameras Utilize 4 Infrared Lights 24H Parking Monitor & Time-lapse Photography Built-in Wi-Fi Function Supports the Micro SD Card Up to 512GB Built-in Supercapacitor Instead of Lithium Battery Dimensions: 4.1 * 2.8 * 1.5 inches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The processor is the CPU of the dash cam. The most popular processor manufacturer for dash cams is Novatek. While the processor is important, the quality of the CMOS sensor and lens are key as well. The D30H dash cam uses a Novatek 96663 + GalaxyCore GC2053 CMOS sensor, which makes it operate stably for a long time. After many analyses, we found that most of the problems of the dash cam are caused by the memory card because the speed and the number of erasing and writing of the memory card cannot meet the requirements. Therefore, we recommend using the SAMSUNG PRO Endurance 128GB Memory Card, please search for B09WB1857W. Please DO NOT USE any "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. They are NOT made for dual FHD 1080P dash cam. The memory card is NOT included in the packaging. Max Supports a 512 GB Micro SD Card. If you use the 64GB or higher card, please format the card on the Dash Cam before you use it. You can find the Format option on the menu.

Warm Tips For better night vision, the interior camera uses a special lens that can detect ultraviolet rays in the sunlight, so the video will be purple. You can test it in places without sunlight. The dash cam works automatically. It starts recording when the engine is turned on and stops when it is turned off. Both cameras can be rotated 180 degrees forward and backward, 50 degrees left and right. No built-in battery for better safety. Please always connect the dash cam to the external power cord while it is in use. This dash cam has the Auto Power Off feature. When there is no external power connection, the dash cam will shut down after 5 seconds. The Package comes with the 3M Adhesive Mount Kit and the Suction Cup Mount, You can choose to install the one you like. The D30H dash cam doesn’t work with any Mirror Mount Kit. The Package comes with Windshield Static Cling to keep the windshield clean. *[24H Parking Monitor] - You need to purchase an ACC hardwire kit (search for B09SCPM4C4) with low battery voltage detection to leave it running when parked (not included).

With advanced facilities and an experienced R&D engineering team, we devote ourselves to the reform and innovation of digital products. Our products are widely accepted by clients from more than 20 countries all over the world. 1 * D30H Dash Cam 1 * 12 Feet Car Charger 1 * Suction Cup Mount 1 * Adhesive Mount Kit 1 * Wire Trim Tool 5* Cable Clips 1 * Windshield Static Cling 1 * User Manual Why choose Pruveeo D30 Dash Cam? Front and Inside Dual FHD 1080P Dash Cam [DUAL FHD 1080P DASH CAM] - Front and Inside cameras each record dual 1080P @ 30fps / single-channel 2160P @ 24fps (multiple resolution options). When the memory card reaches its maximum capacity, the oldest unlocked footage will be overwritten automatically to ensure infinite loop recording. The D30 dash cam will automatically lock the current recording video as proof of an incident once the built-in G-sensor detects a collision. Single-channel Up to 2160P @ 24fps Superior Night Vision & WDR Technology Inside Cameras Utilize 4 Infrared Lights 24H Parking Monitor & Time-lapse Photography Built-in Wi-Fi Function Supports the Micro SD Card Up to 512GB Built-in Supercapacitor Instead of Lithium Battery Dimensions: 4.1 * 2.8 * 1.5 inches

Low Profile and Distraction Free Pruveeo D30H Dash Cam perfectly sits by or behind your rear-view mirror with minimized distraction. The signature's low-profile design allows the dash cam to be a well-hidden witness to the road ahead. High-end Image Sensor Powered by the industry-leading high sensitivity image sensor with F2.2 aperture, Pruveeo D30H Dash Cam provides you with outstanding picture quality in low lighting conditions. Front and Inside Dual FHD 1080P Front and Inside cameras each record 1080P @ 30fps / single-channel 2160P @ 24fps (multiple resolution options). Each camera has a Wide Angle of 150°. The 2.0-inch large LCD allows a Wider and Crystal-clear view.

WDR - Wide Dynamic Range Depending on the lighting, the image may look overexposed or underexposed, but don’t worry, Pruveeo has helped you to resolve the problem with our WDR feature. Once you turned on the WDR feature, the dash cam will combine two images into one, producing an authentic robust image regardless of any type of lighting. Extreme Temperature Resistance Power is delivered by a supercapacitor, a premium alternative to a lithium-ion battery that features enhanced temperature resistance to hot and cold climates. Built to withstand extreme hot or cold climates as high as 158°F and as low as -4°F, adds to the long-term reliability of the camera. Support Micro SD Card up to 512GB V30, U3 Speed Micro-SD Card is required. We Recommend SAMSUNG PRO Endurance 128GB Memory Card, please search for B09WB1857W. Please DO NOT USE any "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. They are NOT made for dual FHD 1080P dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a silent and honest witness.
reviews.reviewText: The mount is poor quality and it broke earlier than I thought. I ordered a new one very easily. However, that one arrived damaged. It was quickly replaced by Amazon customer service. I used the parts to repair the broken one and kept the replacement as a backup. So far so good. The camera looks inside and outside and records everything! Even though it's in color, it seems like most clothing is purple. I got it because I heard about other people who had accidents and it was a your word against mine situation. Never expected I would have to rely on it until someone ran a red light and Tboned my brand new car! In my city, unless you're bleeding or dieing the police don't respond to m.v. accidents. You have to go to the precinct and file a police report. I did not realize how much this little camera captures! 😳 the incident was easy to find and download, but beware that if you are using Google drive to send it to your insurance company you have to turn permissions on or they can't open it. Anyway, the video clip clearly shows my light was a steady green despite what the other party says. I'm very happy! If you don't hard wire it to the battery, make sure you don't drive off without activating it. Could save you alot of aggravation and money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great when I was hit
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend buying. Easy to use and money value is there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dashcam. I just bought another one for my other car
reviews.reviewText: Bought one a few days ago. I like it so I just ordered another one. Here are the reviews so far :Pros :- very easy to use, plugs into the cigarette ligther socket, works fine recording when car is started and stopped- suction cup is extremely secure and steady once you mount it on the windshield. I did not use that "static shield" or some plastic film thingy that they included. I don't know what is that thing for ?- Easy button navigation through menu items- video quality is very good. For reference, a 1-min video at 1080p 30 frame rate("FHD P30") is about 74Mb. I compared 720P("HD P30") and realized there's not much difference in video quality but file size is smaller at 50Mb. I could still make out license plates at 720P so I changed mine to 720P("HD P30") setting- night infrared inside cabin is excellent- rear cam can see the entire cabin, all passengers, and all side windows and rear windowCons : (See photos)- power cord is in the way and gets recorded in the rear cam. I had to bend it really far back to prevent it from being in the rear video footage. The power cord orientation should have the cord at the bottom instead of the top - support team please take note of this design flaw- at night driving you cannot make out any license plates. See the photo showing me at a complete stop and the license plate is just a blur.I did not test any app, wifi, parking, or any other advance functions so I don't know how well those work. Partly because I don't need those, I just need a basic dashcam that records. I hope this review helps others in the decision-making process !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Hot, clear the videos work. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a great camera
reviews.reviewText: Product looks very Sturdy. And high in quality. Gonna try it out the upcoming weeks/months and we we will see how it holds up.Update: I like the fact that this dash camera doesn’t have a battery In it. All the other dash cams I had in the past came with internal batteries and when the battery went bad the camera stopped functioning properly. And they don’t make it easy to replace the battery.Update 2: week and a half of use.I’ve been using the dash camera for about a week and a half (about 70 hours) so far. It’s worked great. I haven’t had any major issues. There was once when I unplugged the hardwire kit from the mini usb from the dash cam and the camera reset to original settings. Out of 3 times I’ve unplugged it it happened once. I noticed when the screensaver didn’t come on and the camera stayed on without turning off the screen. I I’ve also noticed that when the parking mode activates when I get in the car. And I turn on the car it has trouble turning on the infrared night mode when it’s night time. So I gotta turn on the car quickly before parking mode comes on. Another issue I had today was the camera started freezing as it was recording today it would get to about 1:36 and freeze and stop recording. I think this was caused by me taking out the sd card from the camera. I find it easier to view the videos from my iphone lightning cable to micro sd card reader. No matter what the camera wouldn’t work properly. I tried a bunch of things like formatting sd card and nothing. What fixed the issue is disconnecting it from the power completely by disconnecting mini usb from cam and it fixed the problem. It’s working like the first day I got it again.If you plan on getting this cam make sure you remove the power from it every now and then so it can reboot properly. Even personal computers, androids, and iPhones should be shut off and rebooted every now and then so they can work properly. Sometimes they slow down from being on to long.Update 3. Had to take away a ⭐️. I’ve been using this camera for a little over a month and it’s gone threw about 3 sd cards. Samsung Evo 256GbScandisk ultra 128gbScandisk extreme 256gb.In my previous different old camera I had a Scandisk ultra 128gb and it lasted more then 2 years with 50-60 hours of continuous recording weekly.In this camera the sd cards work fine in the beginning but after about a week or so of use it starts freezing which means the sd card starts failing. Cause as soon as I put in a new sd card it works as it should. I’ve also emailed support about the issue I’m having and they stopped responding. They were responding so well before but as soon as the 30 day return window closed on Amazon they stopped responding. Maybe it’s a coincidence. Or maybe not.Im trying one more sd card. “Samsung pro endurance 256gb”. If this one fails as well I’m gonna give this camera 2 stars. And look into buying another dash cam.I bought my girlfriend a different front and rear dash cam and the first sd card I put in it 128gb worked good and never freezes with no problem.It seems like this camera is picky with the SD cards. I’ll keep you guys posted on how this Samsung Endurance pro 256gb sd card turns out.

Es un buen producto, fácil de instalar.Ayudará mucho a respaldarte en caso de algún incidente.La cámara interna sale con tonos morados pero en un editor de video se corrige fácilmente. Tiene buena resolución, apertura y graba bien los detalles pero tampoco esperes un 8k.
Easy to use and the camera quality is 👍🏻 im excited to put it in to my car. tnx

reviews.reviewText: Quality of the inside camera is poor.
Pues te da más por lo que pagas.Vaya que tenga app para ver los videos sin quitar la memoria es realmente practico.

reviews.reviewTitle: Random Restarts and Unintended Shut Downs After 2 Months
reviews.reviewText: Worked perfectly for 2 months, then started randomly restarting, now 4 months in, it would randomly restart with the startup chime, or turn off completely with no warning requiring pushing the power button, which sometimes does not turn the camera back on, which would then need replugging the power supply. Customer support says to factory reset and format the SD card, I did and the camera would seem to work well for temporarily, but then would start acting up again. My Pruveeo F5 installed in my other car has been super reliable, so this brand knows how to build dash cams...or used to...this unreliable D30H is my second and last Pruveeo.
